name: games
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool jet_set_radio_api.
Tool description: A data provider for all things Jet Set Radio in JSON format!
API description: Returns a list of games from the Jet Set Radio API with optional parameters for limiting and sorting the results.

limit.description: Limit the number of items returned in the response. Defaults to '5'.

orderby.description:
Possible Values:
 - `asc`
 - `desc`

sortBy must be present for this to take effect. 
The default value is `asc`

sortby.description: Field by which to sort the results. Possible values are any field on the document, such as 'name' or 'stats'. Defaults to 'name'.
